content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=27.5, y=-7.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (x=27.5, y=-7.5)
- Boiler at position (x=20.5, y=-4.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (x=19.5, y=-1.5)
- PipeGroup connecting the components, starting at position (x=24.5, y=-10.5) and ending at position (x=28.5, y=-3.5)
- Small Electric Poles providing power distribution

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-11.0, y=20.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-11.5, y=18.5) for iron ore storage
- Stone Furnace at position (x=5.0, y=5.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Inserter at position (x=7.5, y=5.5) for transferring iron plates
- BeltGroup facilitating the movement of materials

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=20.0, y=20.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=19.5, y=18.5) for copper ore storage
- Stone Furnace at position (x=2.0, y=0.0) for smelting copper ore into copper plates
- Inserter at position (x=3.5, y=0.5) for transferring copper plates

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at position (x=10.5, y=0.5) for crafting copper cables
- Inserter at position (x=13.5, y=0.5) for inputting copper plates into the assembling machine
- BeltGroup connecting the stone furnace at position (x=2.0, y=0.0) to the assembling machine at position (x=10.5, y=0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when attempting to access non-existent entities
- Verify the existence of an entity at the specified position before attempting to interact with it to avoid exceptions like "No entity of type wooden-chest found at the specified position."
